Posts.Content: Hi have been in a lot of pain with my back for a while because i went to see my plastic surgeon in nottingham he said he wanted me to see a spine specialist before i have my mastectomys.well i went to derby to see a specialist yesterday who wants me to have my mri scan this monday to make sure they havnt missed anything,which am worried about and theres nobody to talk to has they wouldnt understand me.try to always be positive and strong i always have been havnt even got a partener to sit and talk to and be there for me.last year got tested for genetics it came back i was brac 1.why have you got to see a pelvis specialist,how come there not sure about your right breast even if they dont like to touch healthy tissue surely if u want the other breasr removed you can especially if your left one is full of lobular cancer ,would look into that a lot more and find out hope that someone on here will no more about this
Posts.Title: Spine specialist appointment

Posts.Content: Hello there am sorry to here this you must be going through such a lot at the moment. am not so sure what is going on went to see specialist yesterday and now have to have the mri scan monday to see if they have missed anything so am worried.am sure you must be more worried about the bone cancer,he mentioned nerve compression to me am no wiser about it all myself will wait and see when its done and get my results.let me no how you are if i do here anything i will let you no.you keep stronge am sure you already are wish i could of been more help to youx

Posts.Content: Spine specialist appointment yesterday got to have another mri before my double mastectomy
